# NSMatrix.Mode

**Enumeration**

These constants determine how [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell] objects behave when an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMatrix] object is tracking the mouse.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Mode
```

## Constants

- **NSMatrix.Mode.trackModeMatrix**: The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell] objects are asked to track the mouse with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell/trackMouse(with:in:of:untilMouseUp:)] whenever the cursor is inside their bounds. No highlighting is performed.
- **NSMatrix.Mode.highlightModeMatrix**: An [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell] is highlighted before it’s asked to track the mouse, then unhighlighted when it’s done tracking.
- **NSMatrix.Mode.radioModeMatrix**: Selects no more than one [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell] at a time.
- **NSMatrix.Mode.listModeMatrix**: [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell] objects are highlighted, but don’t track the mouse.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
